question: Electronic Vaccine Intelligence Network (eVIN) is being implemented under which of the following Union Ministries?
option1: Ministry of Health and Family Welfare
option2: Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology
answer: Ministry of Health and Family Welfare
explanation: Electronic Vaccine Intelligence Network (eVIN) is being used by the State/UT governments in India to monitor the supply chain of Covid response material and aims to support the Government's of India's Universal Immunization Programme. It is implemented by the Ministry of Health and Family under the National Health Mission (NHM).
